column4: Anybody else have problems with flash+firefox?  Perhaps 2 times in 3 clicks on the flash player do nothing!
known bug. bath interaction with compiz + flash
known bug. bad interaction with compiz + flash
just checked, don't have compiz installed
is any workaround known, or is flash just plain broken?
it comes in pulseaudio utils or some such
why are you using ossaudiodev does python not have modules for alsa or/an pulseaudio ?
I'm trying to port a Python module that works on RHEL5
i do not think it would be any different in any modern distro; it is not just ubuntu
I though dig was a dns only tool.  WIll try nslookup
no, they both seem to go straight to DNS (unless there's some command line option I haven't looked for yet)
